summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: a client-side deterministic rank is computed (lilyCount desc, memberCount desc, name asc) and a visible “#<rank>” indicator is rendered on each All Ponds card with the Join/Joined control kept top-right and spaced to avoid overlap. No backend changes are shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking updates not requested in the BuildRequest (e.g., feature request entries marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for adding pond rank display on All Ponds cards; updating project tracking files is not part of the requested functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Repository-wide frontend file summary documentation updates not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request generating/updating summary documentation files; these changes are unrelated to implementing rank display.
